item.description:
Lucinda Williams has won three Grammy awards, and Time magazine called her America's best songwriter.

She began her career interpreting country, folk, and blues standards with a cool, almost academic reverence for the music. After a second album of original songs, she seemingly vanished for eight years. In 1988 she returned with a vengeance with Lucinda Williams, her highly praised singer/songwriter album that marked a critical turning point in Williams' career. She reached even greater commercial heights with 1998's masterful Car Wheels on a Gravel Road, her first gold album.

Lucinda Williams at NPR.org

Lucinda Williams at RollingStone.com

Lucinda Williams at Amazom.com

See lowellsummermusic.org for more info.

Saturday July 12, 2008 7:30 PM
$30 in advance ($3 surcharge for online orders) / $35 at the gate

I would highly suggest buying tickets in advance.
item.how_to_find_us: We should meet beforehand and set up chairs and blankets
item.why: Good music at an outdoor venue
item.name: Lucinda Williams at Lowell Summer Music
